Device Virus

  1. Does Device Virus scrap an upgrade from your hand or one that's attached to one of your characters? [Source: WotC]
    You must scrap an upgrade attached to one of your characters.
  2. If I play a Device Virus and select one of my armors to scrap but I have Backup Bag on that character and it scraps instead, would my opponent have to scrap armors or utilities? [Source: WotC]
    Your opponent would have to scrap the type of upgrade you chose with Device Virus.
